id: scenario-autonomous-entity-community-investor-scenarios-municipality-investor participation in municipal economic development planning
title: Investor participation in municipal economic development planning
description: Investor participation in municipal economic development planning
content:
Scenario: Investor participation in municipal economic development planning
    Given economic development planning typically excludes community voices
    And Patricia has expertise from community investment experience
    When municipal planning includes community investor participation
    Then she serves on economic development advisory committees
    And community investment perspective informs municipal strategy
    And policy development benefits from investor practical knowledge
    And democratic economy becomes recognized municipal economic development approach
    And municipality_elohim facilitates community investor participation in municipal planning
